title: League in-game resolution broken!

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: So yesterday this happened. Don't know why but it happened. When i start league it goes to windowed mode and when i switch it to fullscreen the game stays the same size but moves to top left corner. I would like to know what i can do to fix this!{{item:3070}} {{item:3151}}

replies.body:
This may happen for a number of reasons. First, ensure your [display resolution](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/4910-screen-resolution-display-change-windows-10-a.html) is set to your *native resolution* by making sure it's set to what Windows recommends. Next, log into League, then hop into your League installation directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and **delete** the folder named **CONFIG**. After you've deleted that folder, hop into a custom match to confirm this has gone through.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.

P.S. Is that Eazy-E in your background? :D
I don't run dual screens so that cant be the problem... I'm scanning my pc for viruses etc. atm. Maybe thats the problem.
